userreviews.userReview: Chilling tales of the unexpected by Ann Girdharry. Trading with deathTell me a secretSweet justice Written on the Apple tree.Four short horror stories. An absolutely fantastic read.  I loved all 4 Stories and the characters.  5*.

This is a box set of short stories each at most an hours reading.Each story is dark offering insights into sacrifice, lust, retribution and regret.We are shown paths and how the protagonists reached their reasoning.A clever book, well written and engaging
These stories were an unexpected treat, well worth a read.
The stories were definitely captivating and interesting, but the endings weren't that great. I either didn't understand it or it just wasn't tied together well.
Thouroughly enjoyed these short stories! I’m not usually a fan of short stories but these were great, I wasn’t left feeling short changed, a lot packed in, would recommend :)
